title: Finance expert talks tips to save money, plan for retirement - WCYB
content: Finance expert talks tips to save money, plan for retirement  WCYB
description: Over 5. 4 million jobs have been lost by women alone, since 2020. Many men have regained jobs lost from the pandemic, but women continue to be out of work, and disproportionately impacted financially. Finance experts say job losses are due to several reasons which include women often being the primary caretakers of aging parents or relatives.
